mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_STATS_MONTHLY(YEAR, MONTH, SELLER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, SUM_PRODUCT_PRICE, SUM_TAX, SUM_TOTAL) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{sellerName}, #{productName}, #{sumProductPrice}, #{sumTax}, #{sumTotal})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT_STATS_MONTHLY WHERE 1 = 1
AND SELLER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sellerName}, '%')
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%')
AND YEAR = #{year}
